The number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking with Daggers is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

When dealing critical damage with a Dagger you apply Bleeding.
The <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical</LSTag> threshold for your dagger attacks is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

Cutthroats bring sneak attacks to the extreme: be it from treacharous stabs from shadows or cruel cuts to enemies made harmless by poisons, their main aim is maximize damage and disappear before any chance of retaliation.
Any successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack roll</LSTag> made while Hiding within 3 m against an out of combat creature is a guaranteed <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>

The DC of your coatings when attacking is increased by your Proficiency Bonus. Moreover, damage from your coatings applies on-hit and successful <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> don't make your enemies immune to further applications of your coating debuffs.

When a weapon attack lands a Critical Hits or kills a creature, you get an additional Bonus Action and 4.5 m of movement that turn.
Wearing Heavy or Medium Armor disables this effect.

When a weapon attack lands a Critical Hits or kills a creature, you get an additional Bonus Action and 6 m of movement that turn. Moreover, ending your turn in Hiding grants you Invisibility until your next turn.
Wearing Heavy or Medium Armor disables this effect.

When landing a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> with a Dagger, you can double the Sneak Attack damage dice you roll in exchange for -5 to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag> for one turn
Delivering such a brutal strike left you exposed. You suffer -5 to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag>
